mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, COMM_NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_ID, COMM_DATE, COMM_CNT, COMM_LIKE_YN, REG_ID FROM T_BEDU_COMM ORDER BY COMM_NUM DESC) WHERE rnum >= #{page} and #{limit} >= rnum

SELECT COMM_NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_ID, COMM_DATE, COMM_CNT, REG_ID FROM T_BEDU_COMM
WHERE CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY COMM_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BEDU_COMM( COMM_NUM, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, COMM_CNT, COMM_LIKE_YN, COMM_DATE, REG_DATE, REG_ID )VALUES( BEDU_COMM.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{comm_cnt}, #{comm_like_yn}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{reg_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT COMM_NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_ID, COMM_DATE, COMM_CNT, COMM_LIKE_YN, REG_ID FROM T_BEDU_COMM WHERE COMM_NUM = #{num}
